name: with all my heart
description:
Uses Flash. The only key used is SPACEBAR.

This is a little arty game or interactive experience made back in 2013 in Flash using Actionscript 3/appropriated sprites/sounds and vocal synth via UTAU. It was inspired by my memories as a lil kid playing the Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening on the Gameboy - specifically, Marin singing the Ballad of the Windfish in the village square. 

<3
